content.title: Next Chapter
description: NextChapter is the case management software created by lawyers, for lawyers. The comprehensive tools offered by this platform include virtual payment options, document automation, virtual paralegals available on a case-by-case basis, and more! As a Justia Connect member, you are eligible to save $100 off of an annual plan.

content.title: Lifestyle Savings
description: The summer travel season is here but you can always monitor what is going on at home! Cove is offering extra savings on its top-rated home security systems to our Justia Connect members. Save $50 on equipment and up to $150 on free monitoring with this exclusive offer; a total of up to $450 worth of equipment and 6 months of 24/7 professional monitoring for just $199.
